title: Multimodal discovery of bavachinin A: A natural FLT3 agonist for treating thrombocytopenia.
abstract: Radiation-induced thrombocytopenia (RIT) poses a serious risk to patients with cancer undergoing radiotherapy and leads to hemorrhage and mortality. Unfortunately, effective treatment options for RIT are currently limited.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
